semantic_identifier: [GOLD-144]: Add issue_history event model + persistence layer (foundation for MVP logs)
title: Add issue_history event model + persistence layer (foundation for MVP logs)

sections.text: Create the database schema and backend domain model for `issue_history` as an append-only event log tied to the standardized Issue object. Define an initial set of event types and payload structure to support upcoming status, priority, merge/split, notes, and external link entries without migrations per event. Add basic write APIs/service helpers to record history events with actor + timestamp, but do not build UI rendering in this ticket.
